roleset.name: to make a clang
roleset.note: CLANG-V NOTES: Frames file for 'clang' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from clang.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: After [*-2] clanging around for an hour or so , [the shiny , hot money]-2 pours out of the cement chute , where a giant vacuum sucks away the dried mud and burnt wrappers [*T*-1] .
